title: Baltimore Braces For More Violence
teaser: NPR's Eyder Peralta is on the streets of Baltimore, talking with residents. He discusses what he's hearing.
contentencoded:
NPR’s Eyder Peralta is on the streets of Baltimore, talking with residents. He discusses what he’s hearing with Here & Now’s Robin Young.

“I see no shame in being violent to be heard,” one woman told Peralta. “Because if you can’t do it peacefully, than what other option do you have.”

  • Read the latest from Eyder Peralta in Baltimore

Guest

  • Eyder Peralta, NPR digital reporter. He tweets @eyderp.
